message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product for $1,200,000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the uniqueness of this product, I'm only willing to pay $1,000,000 for it.  This is my final offer, as I have another option available at that price.

I understand that you have another option available, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering $1,050,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still only able to offer $1,000,000 for the product.  I understand this is a unique item, but my budget is set at this amount. If you're unable to accept this price, I'll have to move forward with my other option.
